"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/543cca0663687253dbc60100#post_543cca0663687253dbc60100
I wonder if it works for other things?  You are now breathing and blinking manually, you are aware that you are manually holding your jaw shut and your mouth is producing saliva, you can't find a comfortable place for your tongue to rest, your nose is in your field of vision, you're aware of that ringing sound in your ears.
